channel.title: Bayesian on t-student
channel.description: Recent content in Bayesian on t-student

item.title: Bayesian Zombies 101
item.description: I find the Statistical Rethinking text very helpful in conveying Bayesian concepts. Here I simply try to condense some of the introductory material. The text is supported with R and Python implementations and there is a youtube lecture series on which the text is based. OK, Bayesian Analysis? Let’s start with inference. What we are talking about here is about using the information available to you in order to arrive at rational conclusions that your mum still won’t have a bar of.
